<font size="36">Welcome to Course Builder!</font>

= Launch your course - Share your experiences =
-------

<table width="100%">
  <tr>
    <td width="80%">
In Course Builder, we packaged the software and technology we used to build our [http://www.powersearchingwithgoogle.com Power Searching with Google] online course. The first time we offered Power Searching, 155,000 students registered and 29% of those completed the course.

We want to make this technology available to you as an open source project so that you can build your own online courses.  Course Builder is our experimental first step in the world of online education.
